column2: align chained methods with comments properly

column3: Fixes https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/IDEA-122802: 'Comments between chained calls aren't indented properly' and https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/IDEA-136980: 'Comments at end of the line during chained calls break allignment'
the last element may be a comment, so let's index from the beginning instead: [DOT, method name, expression list]
I've merged your request, with minor change: I've separated tests, and in the case with block comment used doTextTest method instead to avoid confusion with shifted comment.
align chained methods with comments properly
Changed testChainedMethodWithComments to be more descriptive
